name: The Youthful Documents
description:
This project was created for the module "Technical Games Production" at Staffordshire University. It is an RPG that features combat, professions (cooking, mining, and blacksmithing), an interactive dialogue system with matching voice lines, and a work-in-progress skill tree. The project was worked on over a duration of 12 weeks and has since then not received any major updates. Version 1.0.3 introduces the about section in the main menu. 

We wanted to keep the project as close to what we handed in order to show reflection (for instance, we know that there wasn't enough player feedback). This is why we decided on not polishing this project

Controls
  • Left Click: Attack 
  • Tab - Toggle Inventory
  • Escape - Toggle Pause 
  • E - Interact 
  • C - Character Equipment 
  • T - Skills Menu
  • ALT+F4 - Exit Game (Sorry....)
